position: CA, Head of Finance at Maventech Labs Pvt Ltd(Taiga group of Companies).

experience.title: Finance Accounting Consultant
experience.description: Joined Sharad and Associates, a Hyderabad based firm to assist in growing operations at Raipur,C.G. & Odisha● Managed End-to-End financial reporting and statutorycompliances as per applicable revised accounting standardrelated to revenue recognition.● Supervising team for Month end/Year end accounting booksclosure, balance sheet finalization as per statutory requirements.● TDS and GST compliances for clients related to building materials(Wood products, Plywood, Construction contractors).● Internal / Concurrent Audit of Nationalized Banks and exposure todigital banking solution suite Infosys Finacle.● Coached 10+ interns for day-to-day accounting operations related toGeneral ledger accounting,fixed assets, vendor reconciliation etc inAccounting ERP software.● Exposure to Accounting tools such as Tally Erp 9 and SAP S4 Hana
